title: Alexandra Aparicio
subtitle: #LevelApp aims at having a positive impact on the lives of refugees in Uganda. And we're glad to share what Katusiime Steven said: "the app's not only helped me to buy data. I'm able to afford my basic needs like clothes, good food, toothpaste, detergents etc. Thanks LevelApp." pic.twitter.com/FsnDSJs6oa
